::Composer/Orchestra/Symphony::

  Composer had all the stuff he needed, sa=
lvaged from his pod.  He sent a message to Zardus through his comm-link.

 =
  "Sir, this is Composer, I'm coming back now, with metal and equipment," C=
omposer said, then thrusted off towards the Iron Fist.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Orchestra walked over to Blacknightmare.

     =
"Love, when we are done with this guy, can we please get on to my espionage=
 mission and equipment?" Orchestra said, trying to keep calm, but getting i=
mpatient.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Symphony, being=
 in the middle of nowhere, decided to start getting posted with by Dcoburn.=
  He took his machine gun, and fired 25 shots out of the computer at Dcobur=
n, to get him to post with him.  Dcoburn woke up, and decided to pick up hi=
s lazy ass and post with his characters!  So, he posted Symphony wanting to=
 show that he was a Decepticon, and go into the Maximal base.  He posted Sy=
mphony deciding to try and kill a Maximal.  But he posted Symphony having a=
 hard time trying to forget about his Maximals and killing one of them.
